column4: phlak, md5 inequalities means I just have a bad version and need to redownload then?
you cecked the md5sum of the iso file also?
for 11.10 you can use dd to put the iso on a pendrive. theres also a dozen tools to do it at  the pendrivelinux web site. I tend to do the 'use grub2 to boot iso' type methods these dsays
